existing_features.title: Update all dialog boxes and modal components to use a bold technological visual style matching the color scheme from the GlobalCapitalFlow component (emerald/cyan gradient with dark backgrounds)
Remove all transparent backgrounds from dialog boxes and pop-ups, replacing them with solid dark backgrounds with emerald/cyan accent gradients

new_feature_requests.summary: Update dialog boxes and pop-ups with bold technological visual using capital flow page colors (no transparent boxes)
